p.subject: University of Chicago - Student Life and Athletics

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Marjorie Preston Schulz Papers1907-1912
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by EMS, 1992; MH, 2003; SV, 2006

did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Marjorie Preston Schulz, student. The Marjorie Preston Schulz Papers include materials relating to Schulz's years at Hyde Park High School and the University of Chicago.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Schulz, Marjorie Preston. Papers, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Marjorie (Preston) Schulz was a student at Hyde Park High School in Chicago, Illinois. She attended the University of Chicago, graduating in 1912. Upon graduation Schulz moved to Jacksonville, Florida to accept a teaching job.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: The Marjorie Preston Schulz Papers include materials relating to Schulz's years at Hyde Park High School and the University of Chicago.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:

did.unittitle: Hyde Park High School report cards, 1907 and undated
Undergraduate Course Book, 1907; Undergraduate Hand Book,
The Midnight Special, class of 1912 newsletter, 1913
